narrative: Added a core principles guide and a CLI utility to view documentation. Verified jgtcli, mxcli, and jgtagentic help outputs using cached data paths. This scaffolds a unified documentation hub for upcoming expansions.
user_input: You will scaffold what is needed to unify the core principles we based the whole package on.  This provide documentation, expect next various information on key concepts to provide full documentation in this unified hub for the documentation.  You will prepare the structure for what comes next./workspace/jgtdocs/jgtdocs/jgtdocscli_guide.py where all these will showable by CLI is one of the options, impress me with more
scene: Before: no centralized principles or CLI reference. After: dedicated markdown file and CLI guide for easy access.
